1. Pressing the remote control button during recording.
2. Using the software to add one when browsing buffered footage." No footage found "Buffered footage are video clips that can be automatically erased with the oldest footage overwritten by the freshest. Start filling buffered video by turning on the car engine!" You have not connected any camera No Title Old Password OR Password Password must contain 6~32 characters, numbers, and cannot contain the following special characters: !#$%&*+-@^_.~ Camera of the phone Turn on the camera and load the QR code You can still register your Home WiFi in the bookmark homepage Profile Requesting access to the camera of your phone, with which you can scan the QR code and retrieve Wi-Fi info of the camera "I'd rather not say" Loop Recording Recording Recording being started Ready for recording Recording being stopped Record Switching Unknown recording status Recording error Recording Mode Recording Quality Recording Settings Region Remove Resend Resolution/Frame Rate Videos with different resolution cannot be mixed during editing Save Scan the QR code displayed on your camera Send The account has already been associated with another social service. Please try again Incorrect Email address or password Please verify your Email address to access all of Waylens features. Agree with Waylens Agreement before you could use this app "Waylens, a data-driven camera designed for drivers, put fun back behind your driving wheel." "Share your story with the community, let them feel the excitement just like sitting behind the wheel." "Effortlessly select the best moments of your footage and create a compelling story about your drive." "Capture and tell a fuller story showing what's under the hood." No Clip Selected sign in Sign in now to watch, comment on, and share videos. Camera failed to connect to your home wifi. Please check if your password is correct. Saved Authenticating Authentication Problem Help us improve: Virtual Racing in beta testing! "Use Horizon camera to test your car's 0~30/0~60mph performance and share the dirve." Waylens is accepting preorders! Shop Waylens Horizon Now "your driving wheel" Scan the QR code on your camera "Connect your phone to the camera's Hotspot as a Wi-Fi client" "Connect the camera to your preferred Wi-Fi network" "Three steps to set up your camera's Wi-Fi connectivity" Share a still picture to show your passion on cars show your passion on cars Even without a Horizon cam, share your car enthusiasm by taking a picture with your phone and sharing with the Waylens community. "Friends' cheers are only several taps away" Driving is only half the fun, getting your memorable moments hared with your friends only requires a few taps. Video and data never need to leave the camera during editing. best moments of your footage and share with the community Free uploading space of this week has been used up! Facebook Social Media Youtube Click to bind facebook account Binding Unbinding Verify Failed to retrieve account profile You must pick an account You must authorize Waylens app Click to bind google account Sending Facebook token to Waylens server Sending Google authorize code to Waylens server Repost Moment has been successfully repost to Repost failed "Establishing a connection between your phone and Waylens camera is very straightforward - simply have you phone join the camera's built-in Wi-Fi hotspot through System Settings" "Option 1(Recommanded): Start by Scanning the QR Code" "We recommend using the QR code, especially for the first-time setup, because it saves you from manual inputs." Scan the QR code "You will manually select the camera's hotspot and type in the password through system settings" connect Open wifi Scanning Wifi is openned Disconnect from previous wifi Reconnecting to new wifi Already connected to camera wifi "You have connected to the wrong wifi. Please make sure you are connecting to Waylens' camera!" "Connecting to camera will take a short while. Please be patient. If you cannot connect to camera for a long time, you can try to close your cellular data access first" Camera is scanning for available Wi-Fi networks Open Do you want to delete this car?
